text.text:
Good night :earth_africa::earth_asia:! The EMEA-APAC region of Galaxy will be ending with a closing talk
Live captioning for the closing can be found <https://recapd.com/w-fh9LF-|on this page>.

It's the end of the talks for GCC! We're sorry it's that time, but that doesn't mean we have to say goodbye

1. The CoFest will be happening over in #cofest over the next few days
2. There are SO many ways to keep in touch with the Galaxy Community.

*Community Fora*
1. GalaxyProject Home: https://galaxyproject.org
2. Galaxy servers: <https://galaxyproject.org/use/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Find a Galaxy server near you>!
3. Galaxy Training Network: <https://training.galaxyproject.org/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Start learning Galaxy>
4. Support: <https://help.galaxyproject.org/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Galaxy Help Forum>
5. Galaxy Publications: <https://www.zotero.org/groups/1732893/galaxy?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Zotero>
6. Galaxy Communities: <https://galaxyproject.org/community/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Find and Join a community>
7. Events: <https://galaxyproject.org/events/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Galaxy Event Horizon>
8. Galaxy Working Groups: <https://galaxyproject.org/community/wg/?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|Find and join a WG>
9. GitHub: <https://github.com/galaxyproject?utm_source=gcc2021&utm_medium=slack&utm_campaign=gcc2021|galaxyproject>
